name: rOt 3D
detailed_description:
Third game of the franchise.
Now in 3D!
Minimal puzzle game which goal is to get The Ball to the WinBox using the Circles in the scenes. New obstacles introduced every 10 levels.

- Old obstacles now in 3D!
- HD Resolution
- 30+ Levels
- Simple Interface
- 'One Chance' mode: You have only one chance. If you fail, it's over.

Controls: Arrows and Spacebar,
Mouse for camera control.


Inspired by the amazing game qop
